attributes.action: Recognition to Roy Larner the Lion of London Bridge for his Bravery
attributes.background: Roy Larner known as the Lion of London Bridge has been completely overlooked in the Civil Awards for his bravery, I believe Roy deserves some sort of recognition for his brave actions, in taking on armed terrorists when he was unarmed saving numerous lives.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
